title: Ball O' Hurt
summaries: The Ball O' Hurt is a pre-Hardmode flail that emits small particles similar to those of other objects in the Corruption. The Ball O' Hurt has a 1/5 (20%) chance of being obtained from destroying Shadow Orbs found in the Corruption or a 1/5 (20%) chance from Corrupt Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) and Defiled Crates(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), which are fished in the Corruption.

It is particularly useful when fighting worm-type <linked>enemies</linked> or the <linked>Eater of Worlds</linked> <linked>boss</linked>, since it does relatively constant damage to the multiple segments.
Its best modifier is Godly or Demonic. Both modifiers increase the average damage output by the same amount.
